dmca.title: Copyrights Violations
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Staff Sandungueo.com [mailto:info@sandungueo.net] 
Sent: Saturday, October 23, 2004 3:33 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; info@diamondmusicjoy.net; aldo@cuttingnyc.com
Subject: Copyrights Violations

 

Hi Lance, me and some of my collegues are havin serious problems with a
website dedicated to piracy and copyright violations that is hosted on your
servers.
The domain name is ZONAMUSICAL.NET  65.75.139.80
  67.18.224.162 apollo.xdatacast.com 
Im submitting this claim for my own copyright material that is being posted
on that website and in behalf of 2 of my collegues, Cutting Records Inc. and
Diamond Music Inc.

Im gonna start with my evidence and link information onf where those files
are:
http://www.zonamusical.net/tu_zona/viewtopic.php?t=890

There are like 5 or 6 videos with filenames vip_* and diadelbikini2-C
That material is copyrighted and belongs to my website VIP.SANDUNGUEO.COM
Im attaching images evidence_1.jpg, evidence_2.jpg, evidence_3.jpg,
evidence_4.jpg and evidence_5.jpg to document the violation.

Second, DIAMOND MUSIC INC:
Theres one full recording album called "MAJESTIC 2" posted by them on the
website.
http://www.zonamusical.net/tu_zona/viewtopic.php?t=1453
Im attaching evidence_6.jpg, evidence_7.jpg, evidence_8.jpg and
evidence_9.jpg to document the violation.

Third, CUTTING RECORDS INC:
Theers 2 full recording albums posted on the webiste, one is "GUILLAERA G3"
and the other "NORIEGA CONTRA LA CORRIENTE".
http://www.zonamusical.net/tu_zona/viewtopic.php?t=384
http://www.zonamusical.net/tu_zona/viewtopic.php?t=1570
Im attaching evidence_10.jpg  and evidence_11.jpg to document the violation
for "NORIEGA CONTRA LA CORRIENTE" and evidence_12.jpg, evidence_13.jpg,
evidence_14.jpg, evidence_15.jpg and evidence_16.jpg to document the
violation for "GUILLAERA G3".

This people are decicated to piracy of mp3s, movies, softwares, etc. Theres
a lot more companies affected by this and they are all gonna start sueing.
Cutting Records and Diamond Music authorized me to claim in their behalf.

Our lawyer says that The Planet is liable if they dont take inmediate action
on this.
Im also a client of The Planet and paying one thousand monthly for my 2
total control servers.
I hope that you consider that Im also a client to speed up this as fast as
is in your hands.

Thank you for your time.

Jorge Hidalgo
Sandungueo.com
